issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.description: SLS assumes the host name's network path has one level, e.g., /default-rack/hostFoo. It won't work if the rumen trace comes from clusters with more than one network layer.
fields.summary: Fix scheduler load simulator to support multi-layer network location

comments.body: Here is the draft patch. Also tested it with actual rumen trace.
